name: Bump! (LeonardoDipilato)
description:
Bump! is a 1 vs.1 platform fighter in which your objective is tossing the other player against the spikes.

Move yourself using explosions and ram into your opponent in order to kill them!

Controls:

WASD for player 1

Arrow keys for player 2

R to reset the game, ESC to exit, backspace to open settings while in the menu and spacebar to start. Go ahead, you are already good at it.

(There's also a poor implementation of AI. Use it to get used to the game or place two AIs one against the other and bet on who'll win. Shouldn't be saying this, but sometimes it's more fun than playing the game.)
